title: New Home
author: Lystx
subtitle: - More interactive -
body: We redesigned the whole home menu. As you can see right here. Look around and find out what it offers for you. Maybe you like it.

title: Music Player
author: Lystx
subtitle: - Completely new -
body: The Music Player is now completely new. It now has playlist support and tracks can be edited. You can enter custom tracknames or artist and even trim the track to start or end when you like it. We also implemented a shuffle function.

title: UI Rework
author: Lystx
subtitle: - Completely new -
body: We have decided the UI needs a whole makeover. So we did. Its now way smoother and has fluent animations. You can also change the UI display mode between LIST and GRID. Try it out and let us know what you think about it.

title: EmoteSystem
author: Lystx
subtitle: - we need your help -
body: We are currently working on an EmoteSystem and we are trying to find unique, cool and stylish emote ideas that we can integrate into VeraClient. If you have any ideas do not hesitate to contact us!

title: FriendSystem
author: Lystx
subtitle: - now public -
body: We are proud to announce that we coded and implemented our own FriendSystem into VeraClient. You can now add friends and chat with them directly in VeraClient. Please be aware that this system is currently in its early development state and might still contain bugs!
